userreviews.userReview: I loved this book. It was so cute, with a great story line that will help children understand to accept their individuality. Cynthia Luhrs has a writing style that will captivate young readers. This book is sure to be one that is a family favorite. It's great for those reluctant readers, too.

description: Penny wants to be just like Jig. Only there’s a tiny problem...He’s a very big polka dot pig, and she’s a small chicken. Come along with Penny as she finds out no one else can be you. You’re the only you in the whole wide world. So just be you, whoever you are.Fun rhyme and bright colors come together in this playful story that’s sure to delight each and every one of us.
title: I Am NOT a Chicken!
